description: This file defines React components for visualizing charts and displaying references, fetching data from backend API endpoints. It includes 'ChartVisualization' for rendering either a bar or line chart, and 'ReferenceList' for displaying a list of references.

methods.name: ChartVisualization({ chartType = "bar", chartQuery = null })
methods.description: Fetches chart data from the backend and renders a chart (bar or line) based on the specified type.

methods.name: ReferenceList
methods.description: Fetches and displays a list of references from the backend.
